website_summaries.verdict: Compact and mighty, with the ability to pair with two devices.
pros: Perfect for music on the go, fitting in purses and pockets with ease
Customers appreciate the attractive design and the lengthy battery life
Provides a variety of uses including serving as a conference line

customer_reviews.title: Great...until it started buzzing
customer_reviews.text: Had I written this review 2 years ago when I first got this speaker, I would have given it 5 stars. The sound was amazing and it's a nice compact size. However, just 2 years after spending $120 on this item, it is suddenly buzzing during play, making it unusable. I contacted the seller and received this response: "We are sorry for the inconvenience however upon checking it has already passed the 30-days guarantee period. Please have the item fixed at your local shop." At least I got 2 years out of it. I would be super pissed if this happened on Day 31!
customer_reviews.author: Houdini

customer_reviews.title: i only used it few times and i started hearing ...
customer_reviews.text: i only used it few times and i started hearing statics. the vendor reply and ask to check if its blue tooth connection issues while i continue to have this problem having the blue tooth right next to the speaker. i bought this speaker for the name brand and didn't anticipate such a problem in a early stage of using the product while my return policy had already expired.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Choi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional with a good sound.
customer_reviews.text: The HH-EM is a beautiful, functional and great sounding Bluetooth speaker. The EM fits easily in your pockets, purse, backpack or Camera bag. It has a great sound for its size. It connects easily with all my devices, such as my iPhone, Samsung Tabelet, Lexus, BMW, Honda and my receiver. It also acts as a great speaker for my phone. And finally, please note that the bass won’t shake your walls but it’s there.
customer_reviews.author: H.E. TyreeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: the speaker sounded really good. However
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the speaker sounded really good. However, after only two months, the sound quality significantly declined with a lot of "rattling" when playing music. I requested a new, replacement speaker and again, after approximately 2 months, the sound quality significantly declined. Will look for other Bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Damani K Parran

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this SO much
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this SO much.. but.. It’s a little under-powered soundwise; the sound is good, though not as rich as other (slightly bulkier, and less beautiful) units that cost half as much. I didn’t mean to get this, but I may opt not to return it simply because, as a designed object, I find it THAT inspiring. However, if collecting nice objects isn’t your thing, you’ll be better off with something else, like one of the speakers from DOSS (they have one for under $20 that’s exceptional)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the office!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and look of this. For home use, I would not suggest it b/c the sound quality is not that great but I would suggest it for office use b/c it is better than computer speakers and it has a nice sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It has been less than two month since I’ve had this speaker and it has already proven defective. At first, the volume was crisp and clear, now there’s an excessive vibration(regardless of the volume level) which makes it hard to listen anything. In addition, the sound goes in and out.
customer_reviews.author: MLawrence

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dumb girl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, but horrible sound. Only slightly better than the phone itself. I’ve used the Bose mini Soundlink for many years, but gave mine away and needed a replacement. I regret purchasing this mini speaker. Hardly any bass.. very shallow, tin-box sound. I ended up purchasing the Bose mini soundlink 2 and will use this one as a back-up for the beach or picnic. It’s only redeeming quality is its design. It’s estebticalv pleasing but has no substance at al.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Carreon

customer_reviews.title: don't like the fact that the battery is not user replaceable
customer_reviews.text: a lot of sound from a little speaker. don't like the fact that the battery is not user replaceable. i can only hope that i get 5 or more years out of it before it ends up in a landfill. i removed one star for only that reason. update: dropped to one star. bought the unit in june 2018 for just a bit more than $68. by august 2019, wouldn't hold a charge. more junk for a landfill now. WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ortisi

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this speaker doesn't have a higher rating. The sound quality is incredible for a speaker this size. I travel quite a but for work and wanted something I could throw in my slim laptop bag to use for music in the hotel room, conference calls, and presentations. I think this will fit the bill perfectly! My only gripe would be that I don't like the micro usb port and I wish that accessories like this would embrace either an HDMI-C or a lightning port. But, that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bradey Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box, brand new, won't charge right and sounds like scratches to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a small alternative to the Onyx, by far the worst sounding speaker I have ever owned. It won't play anything when it isn't plugged in. Had problems connecting to bluetooth, and wouldn't charge the battery out of the box. Worst buy I have had in a while. The LOOK and FEEL of the actual speaker is amazing. The packaging was impressive. No charge plug with the speaker though, just cord. Which seems a little odd for something so sleek. Not sure if I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Triumph of Style over Substance
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. But the sound is mediocre (poor bass); and its fancy styling makes it rather fragile and easy to bang up. Perhaps if the original price (149!!!) didn't match its fancy Euro styling, this would be a good buy. But HK really dropped the ball on this one... I use mine as a bedroom charger and phone speaker; and at 40 bucks from a re-seller, i am very happy with it. But I wouldn't pay more than 50 bucks for it or use it as an actual speaker. The Bose micro is an infinitely better sounding and more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: didn't met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because of the portability, at the moment seemed like a good idea but what I noticed immediately was the poor sound quality. I have Bose SoundLink Mini so maybe my expectation were high. I only used the speaker occasionally and a couple of days ago it started failing, sound like the speaker is broke inside
customer_reviews.author: Marsano

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon Esquire Mini, Dont waiste your money, they will not support you.  Harman will not honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these Harman Speakers, it sounded good. USB charging port has a bad design. Bad out of box. Harman Kardon was unwilling to repair or replace for warranty. I would hold little faith in Harman or any of their partners. Returned item for Amazon credit.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great quality! Wasn't expecting it to be as small in size as it is (about the size of a smart phone with a 5.5" screen) which makes it very portable to put in your pocket. Sound is great for the size and price. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nope

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Have had this speaker since December 2015. Speaker will no longer hold a charge. Paid $150. I have had a portable Bose speaker for almost 5 years - and it still works great. VERY DISAPPOINTED with Harmon. Won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Distorted sound after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sleek speaker, a well-known, trusted brand. I had to write a review 13 months later because, with normal use the speaker is now very obviously distorted and crackling. It’s disappointing that a speaker of this apparent quality only lasted 13 months of use. I’m not sure but this brand may have sold their tech/design patent because I saw the same speaker design on QVC slapped with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ashburyniran

customer_reviews.title: Does not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great at first but not longer after I was unable to return it, the sound quality is terrible. Static at almost any level. Don't usually write reviews and I did buy this back in 2016. Still looks brand new but sound like its very old. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Clean and crisp, but needs a bit more bass.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this guy on a weekend trip at hotel and watched movies on my Asus C302 flip, paired this little guy and we were blown away at the quality of sound. Only thing lacking to make it a complete Bluetooth speaker is a bit more bass. Hopefully, they can implement on next device. Everything else is clean and crisp! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year old and the speaker sounds horrible - lots of static and scratchy sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used with my laptop for conference calls/skype/music playback. The sound quality for calls and skype was good, for music ok given it's size. Less than a year later it rattles terribly, there's lots of static, just bad sound quality overall. I called HK customer service and was told the warranty was expired and nothing could be done. This speaker has never left my desk or been dropped or damaged in any other way. Very disappointed with this speaker. I would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Speedbird001

customer_reviews.title: I bought this speaker less than a year ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker less than a year ago and didn't even use it for the first six months. It was a gift for my wife who said "thank you" and put it away in her nightstand drawer. About 2 months ago I saw it and started using it. Same as a lot of people already said, it started losing sound quality really fast at only 50% volume as well. I may attempt to get Harman Kardon to repair/replace under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Porfect

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Blow Out Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker for the sound and the sleek design. It was perfect for vacation, beach, pool and at home/ back yard. My speaker blew and now it's just garbage. I would never have spent the money on this if I knew it would crap out so soon.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this speaker. It is a perfect size with a BIG sound. In fact, after using it for awhile I purchased several for gifts and have received nothing but positive feedback! I use it to travel for great sound in my hotel room, at the beach, and also use it for conference calls. Would highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Rozell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible... Please return and refund...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really quite surprised at this product from the house of harmon kardon. It's near looking. But the design is unergonomic. Worst of all it's been less than 2 years and the speaker cracks. It's essentially unusable. Cause it makes an annoying noise when played. I'm quite disappointed and feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Good product but died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great portable speaker which I was using almost daily at work, but after only 4 months of use, the speaker is now blown out and sound quality is awful. It's no longer usable. This is my second speaker from them, and it happened to my last speaker after about 1 year of use. Reading the other reviews, this is clearly a hardware issue with the product that the company has not addressed. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: HK Lemon
customer_reviews.text: HK didn't have their heart in it when they made this speaker. Distortion at half volume. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ohpattycakes

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and can carry anywhere. The battery lasts long. Connects with Bluetooth to any device quickly and without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Berry

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: AM VERY DISAPPOINTED. IF I TURN THE VOLUME UP EVEN A LITTLE I GET DISTORTION. AND I ONLY PURCHASED IT A FEW MONTHS AGO. I LOVE HOW SMALL IT IS BUT DOESN'T DO ME ANY GOOD IF THE SOUND IS NOT GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pitto

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: small, good sound, good mic. perfect for using my mobile as a conference phone. I like the fact that i can charge my cell phone from the speaker so I don't have to be concerned about the bluetooth running down my batter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought on June 14, 2016, rarely used, somehow speaker is now full of static.
customer_reviews.text: It's been 53 weeks since I bought this thing. I rarely use it. Never use it at full volume. And all of the sudden it sounds like the speaker is blown with terrible static. WTF??
customer_reviews.author: J Knight

customer_reviews.title: Looks great....
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not great but works for low volume hotel use. It dropped from night stand and dented housing more than I would have thought. I since bought Bose micro and it is worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CJ VERY satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker i ever brought love the sound carry it with me every were i go just wish i could find a carrying case for it do you sell any if so can you send me the link
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte James

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: The speaker became distorted after one month of use. I was overseas, wrote to company, had their attention, wrote them four times, and they closed my case saying they had not heard back from me. I would like some rectification. This is not just nor correct. I would give you ZERO rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Urquiza

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has poor sound due to vibrations or static in the unit. We had to return it once and were given a new unit that had similar issues. It was never dropped but isn’t sounding right at all. Harmon Kardon gave no help with this less 6 month old speaker. Amazon was much more helpful than Harmon Kardon.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality Problem
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for first year or so. I only use once a week. All of a sudden the sound was fuzzy. Sounds like the woofer was ripped. Don’t know how this can happen or what caused the sound to be fuzzy. Had to order another speaker recently. Hoping the same problem doesn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's warranty on this unit
customer_reviews.text: First time sound was great after a couple of months Audio distortion comes from speaker sound bad like a loud buzzing ..i have read lots of people have same problem with unit
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to buy warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The first two days and it sounds like it blew up already very disappointed I regret not buying the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive sound for the size of the speaker. About the size of 2 iPhones stacked together. Charge has lasted over 6 hours when I was working on a deck. I gave up first
customer_reviews.author: sallread

customer_reviews.title: Speaker works well but not the re-charge. You have ...
customer_reviews.text: Speaker works well but not the re-charge. You have to turn on the speakers for re-charge to work. It's slow and ineffective. Since the speakers are on while re-charging, the battery is drained within 45 mins. This is effectively a speaker only.
customer_reviews.author: Najam Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Top-quality, multi-function
customer_reviews.text: Light, attractive, great sound at moderate volume. Long battery life, with added ability to recharge a phone in a pinch. Built-in microphone improves quality of teleconference almost as much as an expensive dedicated speakerphone.
customer_reviews.author: NRK

customer_reviews.title: Power speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very familiar with the brand and it lives up to the name. Friend hand one and i was absolutely impressed by the speaker volume that i purchased one for myself and use it daily in the bathroom area while showering.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Mini Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the speaker and use it at the office all the time. For my purpose the speaker system perform well.
customer_reviews.author: W. F. Head

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design,quality, durability and sound of the HK Esquire Mini. It is fantastic in every way but has lack of a good base.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Alzayer

customer_reviews.title: sound quality terrible
customer_reviews.text: use for audiobook CD's and sound quality is so poor frequently cannot make out the words being read, regardless of the narrator. very expensive and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker for the price! Harman Kardon is a trusted brand and is reliable! My husband is a sound engineer and loves these little guys! For the price you are getting great quality!
customer_reviews.author: julianna jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months this is performing horribly. Sound is unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: a nation

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good sound well made have bought 3 for my kids
customer_reviews.author: norden weingarten

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite traveling companions on my many business trips
customer_reviews.text: I already have one and I bought this for my son who saw the device I had. This is one of my favorite traveling companions on my many business trips. Playing my music with exceptional sound quality in the hotel room breaks the monotony on these travels. Whats even better is the speaker phone feature which is exceptionally good.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Low or Loud
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. However, the volume capacity sucks. The increments are either low or loud. No smooth volume transition at all.
customer_reviews.author: 1st  Gen Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: For its size & price a best buy The sound is amazing from such a small ...
customer_reviews.text: For its size & price a best buy The sound is amazing from such a small unit. Bright clear with as much bass as you can get from something that fits in a cell phone case. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for such a compact speaker. I love Harmon Kardon speakers. The sound quality is always great!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Powerful quality device
customer_reviews.text: Love the performance, quality and sound of this little speaker. Only loses one star for not so good with power sources outside of the US. My trip to New Zealand killed it. So I bought another when I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Great sound! Gave it a 4 rating because of the phone part of the speaker does not seem to work well. No one can hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Li

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker! I bought it for my husband as a gift and really enjoys it. It fits right in his pocket. For the speaker to be small, it really has a great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking product but the battery life is not great and at higher volume the sound becomes distorted. The only reason I am not angry is because it was not very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: The Balls!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kick ass mini speaker for my wife in December of 2016, and I have to say after almost a year of both of us using it several times a week, it still kicks ass! Can't go wrong with Harman Kardon products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is the best item. I would like to recommend it strongly
customer_reviews.text: It is the best item. I would like to recommend it strongly.
customer_reviews.author: Jae-Suk Pyo

customer_reviews.title: volume
customer_reviews.text: small compact nice little speaker but the volume not loud
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James Dziadkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Could not believe how poor the sound is
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. Lots of static noise. Could not believe how poor the sound is.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great for computer speaker phone.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a Bose mini which sounds much better for music, however I knew that befor buying it. It works excellent for a speaker phone with my computer. Don't get me wrong, the sound for music is not bad, it just doesn't have the bass depth like the Bose mini. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hook

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid speaker, perfect for traveling or putting it in your office. It's just as I expected, quality sound, not a huge bass response, and compact. Would recommend this for some portable good sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a high quality sound speaker and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for livingroom entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was great. Perfect for podcasts and others but for the money I would like a little more bass.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Sounds better.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Sleek look. Goes perfectly as an accent to my sunroom.
customer_reviews.author: diamonddani815

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Bought if for conference calls, but use it all day for music in the office. Battery life is great, music sounds better than expected for such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Worst speaker - best noise maker that can be bought for money!
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase I made in years. Besides its cute design - this speaker is simply a disaster! Battery lasts one day only and it plays horrifically - basically impossible to listen it loudly because it makes a terrible noise. Will toss it to recycle bin today.
customer_reviews.author: Jaunius

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just right for anywhere and especially the bathroom for shower singing. UPDATED: The speaker worked fine until 3 months ago. Now it will not keep a charge and had to be plugged in to work. Just today it is not taking power and sounds awful. I expected more then 3 years out of it but HK must be different nowadays. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: 7 out of 10 (need to fix power button goes on to easy)
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I purchased that I really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Brian buck

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with the speaker!! It is not working properly, the speaker is causing distortion all the time... Disappointed with this product..
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Gruning

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This unit failed after being used FIVE times!!!!! Amazon website doesn't have warranty information on the entire site. I will definitely think twice (where to buy) next time I need a digital device.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I bought it for my twin sister for our birthday after my bf introduced me to his. To my great surprise, she bought me the exact same gift. BEST BIRTHDAY EVER, lol. Admittedly, I'd been raving about my bf's and how great the sound is for such a small speaker. It's easy to use & looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sounding bluetooth speaker that is also a great handsfree ...
customer_reviews.text: Sweet sounding bluetooth speaker that is also a great handsfree speakerphone. It also is compact and packs away well for travel. This is a BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Colossus of the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small device great sound easy to connect by Bluetooth no regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: CRJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hope this one last longer than my last...But then this time I bought the Insurance !!
customer_reviews.author: Philip G. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: A disposable product
customer_reviews.text: After one year and more or less 25 uses, the speaker started to saturate. The sound is now awfull. Is cheap for being a "premium brand" but to expensive for being a disposable speaker. And of course is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Schröder

customer_reviews.title: Loud, clear, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Great volume. Bluetooth connection for calls works very well! I use it for dictation and calls rather than holding my iPhone to my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not at all loud enough for business meeting. Too expensive, if it doesn't preform as you would like. Was able to return with no problem
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice it's pocket size but the volume doesn't get too high!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I am really dissapointed! it worked only 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really dissapointed! it worked only 3 months, after it, I couldnt charge it anymore, the mini usb port for charging it it does not working anymore. I dont recomend this product and I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Saa  Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Not for music.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker has no bass at all and it is not loud enough. Good for talking on the phone, but not for music.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker for my computer, but probably would want better sound if I were serious about music
customer_reviews.author: G. Finn

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Really loud for its size almost as loud as my brother's bose mini thing and much much smaller. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: whiteranger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect a booming sound, but extremely handy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Fpdemelo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from such a small footprint!
customer_reviews.text: What great sound from such a small speaker. It rivals my bigger Bose speakers! Costly but the quality is well worth it. Great battery life to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Darron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Rattling and static noise
customer_reviews.text: Horrible speaker it did not work well. I don’t understand how they are still selling theses. The sound quality of the speaker is horrendous. I recommend you not to purchase this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal shergill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound - easy to connect and wife loves it as this was one of her Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great with ALL my devices! Including my Surface Pro 4, Samsung phone, work pc.  Easy to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with ALL my devices! Including my Surface Pro 4, Samsung phone, work pc. Easy to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. Battery life just fine
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not clear and on high volumes, you can hear a lot of scratchy noises. Would not recommend. Battery life just fine.
customer_reviews.author: adamski-rem

customer_reviews.title: Expect good quality and volume without it being a massive, booming unit and you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great for its size and also puts put a decent amount of volume without sacrificing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lewallen

customer_reviews.title: For a teleconference phone, this is a great purchase. Well made. High utility.
customer_reviews.text: As a conference phone this is a great purchase. The sound quality is great on both ends of a call. As for music quality, it's great for my type of music. I bought it purely for an extension to my iPhone call use. The product is well made. The kickstand is great. Just push the opposite end and it pops out easily. The ability to charge a phone has allowed me to retire the two back-up chargers that I typically carry. The price was tough to justify. $129.00 would price this right. That said, it is one of the better purchases I've made in a while for productivity and usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Nice housing...
customer_reviews.text: But it's just not loud enough. For the price, the amount of volume this speaker produces could be better.
customer_reviews.author: John Becknell

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking design, quality materials and clear sound
customer_reviews.text: incredibly loud sound for its size, it's very light. Also elegant, nice retro 70s-modern design. It's very thin so the bass is not the best
customer_reviews.author: adrianp

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sound from such a small speaker. Quick to charge as well.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. The sound is so clear

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker. I bought this speaker for my husband who connected it via Bluetooth to the tv. It sounds good and has lasted over 8 hours on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: tonya sears

customer_reviews.title: Ok speaker, Priced to high for value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good speaker, well made, disappointed with sound on higher volume, struggles with bass.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Great travel speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome travel companion...small, sleek, light, sounds great for size, packs easily, vastly improves sound for movies, radio, conference calls. After having Jambox and Bose portables, this is my favorite. Also get the Case Logic case....it fits the speaker perfectly with cables to protect and slip easily into your briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Good name brand. good sound for the size and it is a memory bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to take with me on the road and provide great flexibility on conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Martinez

product_meta.title: Harman Kardon Esquire Mini Brown Esquire Mini Speaker
product_meta.description: Color:BrownHarman Kardon Esquire Mini is a bold, state-of-the-art solution exceeding the needs of the on-the-go professional. No attention-to detail has been spared-from the lineup of premium materials utilized by master craftsmanship to the chic urban styling of its sublime, unibody design. Completely portable and wireless, it provides exceptional sound from its dual, high-performance drivers and enhanced bass port design -for the best quality sound in its category. Esquire Mini is also Bluetooth-enabled, for full stereo streaming with your favorite devices. It’s the must-have accessory for your audio style. It doubles as a conference phone system with dual-microphone and built-in echo and noise cancelation technology for superb sound and USB access to recharge your favorite devices. An 8-hour, rechargeable Li-ion battery promises remote accessibility while its runway-ready, head-turning appearance translates to an indispensable travel companion for work or play. This is one piece designed to offer style and performance for you and your music.
feature_bullets: Advanced craftsmanship redefined elegance and performance in an all-in-one speaker
The ultra-thin speaker to take your music anywhere
Rechargeable battery with 8-hour playtime and USB for charging external devices
Versatile, dual-microphone conferencing system with echo and noise cancelation technology
